original: 《 編成 》　　一個軍團最多可集結 20位武將部隊，每支部隊　　最多 500步兵、250騎兵、125大型單位。　　守城方武將可以全部上陣，不限制 20隻部隊。
text: "Compilation" 　　A legion can assemble a maximum of 20 generals, and each army 　　 has a maximum of 500 infantry, 250 cavalry, and 125 large units.　　All the generals defending the city can go into battle, and there is no limit to 20 troops.
